projects.name: SportSee
projects.description: The project was to create a dashboard in a profile page for the user to check on his performances. I structured the application with React, interacted with an API to retrieve user informations and used a library to create dynamic graphs based on user data.

projects.name: Kasa
projects.description: This is a project for a real estate agency that wants to update its website. In this project I used React to create a navigation between different pages and reusable components, I retrieved the ads with JSON files.

projects.name: FishEye
projects.description: This is the project of a website that hosts the profiles of different photographers with their photos and videos. This project allowed me to learn how to use JavaScript with a JSON file and to make my site accessible to people with disabilities who need a screen reader.

projects.name: Ohmyfood
projects.description: In this project I had to create an app where users could choose between menus of different restaurants an make a reservation. I had to create the app on mobile first with HTML CSS and make the animations with CSS.
